name: XBRL Europe
goal: XBRL Europe is an international non profit organisation (association internationale sans but lucratif) based in Brussels, set up to foster European XBRL efforts and to implement common XBRL projects in Europe between its members and to liaise with European Authorities and organisations.
interests: Enterprise, Information Society, Internal Market, Taxation
euInitiatives:
Transparency directive
Accounting directive
Supervisory reporting in Banking, Insurance and Financial markets sectors
Annual accounts reporting
Tax authority reporting
Data protection
